website_summaries.verdict: Great for light work, softer wood and sanding, users will need to purchase a more powerful tool if they intend to handle larger or more frequent cutting or smoothing jobs.
pros: Blade changes are relatively simple with Dremel’s Quickfit feature, and the multi-tool runs more quietly than more powerful tools due to its lower 2.3A rating
cons: Some users had difficulty getting the blade attachments to clamp down tightly enough
Hardwoods and heavy work cause power problems for this multi-tool

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: The number of projects one can do with this is amazing. The blades seem a bit expensive, but time saved in getting a flush cut is worth it. my only complaint is the Allen key needed to switch blades has no way to store it on the power cord or on the machine itself. Since there is no case for it, I'm going to have to buy an after market allen key holder so I don't loose it. If it had that feature included, it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Leko 69

customer_reviews.title: A good versatile tool for anyone
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a tool like this for a long time. My dad had one in another brand, and there just were too many uses for it, so I had to get my own. I chose Dremel just because I know that they are a brand that will stick around that will always be easy to find parts for. It is simple to change out the tool attachments, and I love the little half-circle saw blade. I like how portable it is, and that I can do lots of small jobs around the house even though I don't own full-size saws or sanders. The small size makes it easy to control.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crotts

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: I have several different types of Dremel's and like them all. The oscillating Dremel is overall easy to use, sturdy and is great for cutting outlets in back of cabinets and other uses when a rotary tool or router will not work. You can get in close and make clean cuts. The only issue I have with it is you really have to tighten down the nut as it will back out when tool is in use. Even with torqueing it down well you still need to check every few minutes to make sure it is not coming lose. However that aside it is a great tool and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut some trim to make room for ceiling panels and to cutout outlets in paneling for my basement. Works flawlessly. I also got the depth guide to go along with it and it works great as well. Doesn't have a ton of power, but works really for for the wood and panels I'm using it on. I'd definitely up the amps if I were cutting tile. Again, should have bought one of these a long time ago. Really handy.
customer_reviews.author: skibumpackerfan

customer_reviews.title: Dremel
customer_reviews.text: was a replacement for the original multimax 4300. It is a little bigger than the one that I had but not as monstrous as others. I wanted a smaller/ lighter version so i can hold on to it longer and not have any hand fatigue. works well. Sad that it didnt come with a case but I used the new multimax to cut out the inside of the old case. Perfect fit, and for the attachments
customer_reviews.author: pretzelguy

customer_reviews.title: Works well on plastic and makes smooth cuts
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my need. I bought this to slice out the end of a plastic battery box to make way for a bigger set of batteries, the included flush cutter worked well, i learned not to push the tool, let it cut and lightly feed it along, the cuts were quite smooth though i used the included sand paper to clean them up a bit i ran it at medium speed and the cut was very controlled.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool to own!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this multi tool while remodeling our bathrooms. It’s has come in handy for so many things! I’ve used it for cutting baseboards, fixing drywall holes, sanding, cutting door mortises, etc. It has quickly turned into my go to tool for many small odd jobs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: This tool is GREAT for getting into those hard-to-reach places
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cut the bottoms off of some door trim while installing wood floors in my house. This tool is GREAT for getting into those hard-to-reach places. It slices right through the wood without any trouble. Easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: SkootTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, versatile
customer_reviews.text: My niece, who is NOT a tool user, borrowed mine and commented "What a lovely tool!" after managing a few simple cuts. She has never said a nice thing about a tool before!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P. McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Handyman loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gift that keeps on giving. Gave to buddy who does bathroom remodels & other light contracting. Uses tool to cut all kinds of materials. Working great after using it alot for a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnycat

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Given it about an hour of actual running time over several home projects. Flawless performance. Noisy and sounds terrible but with cutting anything there’s noise.
customer_reviews.author: Russkull

customer_reviews.title: so I sold it and bought the newer model which is easy to swap pieces
customer_reviews.text: This model is OKAY, but it's a hassle to keep trying to unscrew and switch a piece everytime, so I sold it and bought the newer model which is easy to swap pieces.
customer_reviews.author: TopCop

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cut oak door casing for laying tile. This saw couldn't cut 21/4" oak casing. Probably would work good on drywall. Had to buy offset hand saw and it worked good. Returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Ulm

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is that it is corded. I switched to cordless so it doesn’t get as much use as it used to. Still works fine after many many years and always gets the job done no matter how big the job.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Correnti

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the heft of it. I expect it to last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Charles Easton

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it is not all that many make these devices out to be. I bought it to remove old flooring and it didn't work like people told me it would. I tried multiple blades and still had to much hard hand work. Maybe one day I will find more use for it and feel differently.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool so far. Seems well built and feels heavy duty. Exactly as described and worked perfect for the project I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Brockey

customer_reviews.title: ... been a Dremel fan and this tool does not disappoint. Used it to trim around door jambs for ...
customer_reviews.text: Always been a Dremel fan and this tool does not disappoint. Used it to trim around door jambs for a wood floor install and the sanding pads work well for finishing the baseboards . Love it .
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product was missing critical pieces. It also came in a clear bag like it was refurbished even though the description says new.
customer_reviews.author: Inferno

customer_reviews.title: smokin hot
customer_reviews.text: I used this mainly to remove my grout. even at max power and a carbide but, it seemed to overheat, so I had to stop every 30-45 seconds to let this dremel and my hand cool off. very loud, you should use ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but buy blades for it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but the cutting blades that it comes with are not very good so be prepared to purchase some. Also be careful what you decide to sand with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit underpowered. I would recommend for light uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dale B.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful little tool!
customer_reviews.text: I'm installing laminate throughout my house and there is some hardwood in the kitchen that needs removed first. I'm using this tool to cut around the edges of the cabinets because our hardwoods are going under them. The dremel came in today and in about 45 minutes I'm already done! I highly recommend buying this. You can be sure I'll be finding more projects to use this bad boy on.
customer_reviews.author: Ena reaves

customer_reviews.title: The best product ever, so love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Use it all the time for so many things. I’ve been remodeling my house for the last couple years and wish I had gotten it when I first started.
customer_reviews.author: Betty JoAnn Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It saved a lot of time and money. Well worth it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: GrampaBear

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Works great. I deducted one star because the "accessories" (blades) are few & IMO of lower quality (they get dull very fast). I purchased some aftermarket universal blades (B002SHJA8Q) & the combination has been flawless. I think Dremel should up the ante on the blades. The carrying case isn't so grand either. I recommend the product with those 2 caveats.
customer_reviews.author: C. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool for so many jobs now that I have it. The short list is: Drywall patch jobs, cabinet refacing, tile grout removal, wall stud cutting, base trim cutting, wood sanding, polishing, paint removal.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool. Several attachments and can purchase other attachments ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. Several attachments and can purchase other attachments online or at Home Depot. Bought this tool to cut off edges of doors and door facings to install hardwood. Very easy to use. Must let the tool do the work and not try to force it. Will also be trying this on other projects such as small area sanding with hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Must have in your toolbox
customer_reviews.text: This tool worked perfectly for cutting out a section of existing baseboard. Its very easy to use and it better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: BB59

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I used this to recaulk my leaking camper. It was so much easier than trying to use something manually. It cut the time down. Priced the competition price was much better than the competion. For the amount of time I will be using this it was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Ok, I bought it again.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. Easy to operate. Not to much noize when is working,
customer_reviews.author: Sergio R M

customer_reviews.title: Have used this tool often for drywall, breaking loose ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this tool often for drywall, breaking loose sealer to counter top. Just wish blades were more reasonable but they work
customer_reviews.author: Marc D. Leeke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It makes every cut I want it too that other saws can't
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It's an ok tool. I basically wanted the triangle ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok tool. I basically wanted the triangle shaped head for difficult to reach corners on stairs and a bathtub - both of which I am refinishing.
customer_reviews.author: Archetypehealer

customer_reviews.title: A must have! I own a small shop / ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have! I own a small shop / hobby and this puppy saved me from quite a few mis-fires.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This is my second one and its a lot less noisy than my other brand
customer_reviews.author: Dominic R.

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a couple of time doing cutouts for electrical boxes. This thing rocks! Haven't had the switch issues others are complaining about. If I do, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: George Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not really a kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought the refurbished "kit" and it was just the tool. I needed all the parts so returned it.. luckilly they honored their return policy... but it should say that its just he tool only on the refurbished units.
customer_reviews.author: Higrpwd

customer_reviews.title: Well Made- Multiple Uses- Perfect Gift for Wood Working Son!!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son who enjoys wood working. 33 year old son absolutely loves this product. He was impressed by how well it is made and how many uses he has found for all the accessories!
customer_reviews.author: L. English

customer_reviews.title: A handy dandy little powerhouse.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this Dremel as a gift. It has been used to replace old baseboards and it has done a great job. What a nice machine. I would suggest this to everyone who is looking to do home repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J Williams

customer_reviews.title: awesome..
customer_reviews.text: I was installing wood flooring in my daughters bedroom. For my job, this tool was a life saver. I was able to cut under the door molding to slide the flooring under without removing the molding. Cutting and sanded.......awesome.......Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Donald A Chapin

customer_reviews.title: It is ok, just ok. If I could ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok, just ok. If I could do it again I would buy the next model up with more attachments.
customer_reviews.author: K.L

customer_reviews.title: Lock washer will keep the blade tight
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I ever did without this for 30 years. Use a lock-washer and an additional flat washer to keep the blade tight.
customer_reviews.author: Mt. Bike Skier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This wonder got me through some tasks in my kitchen remodel that would have been impossible without. Powerful, yet easy to maneuver and control. Cut though concrete, nails, and even fabricated the tongue and groove on some laminate flooring pieces to reduce waste.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gehman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am getting my wood working tools together. along with a dermal rotary tools needed to carve
customer_reviews.author: Crazeycelt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to change tools, gets a little heavy after extended use scraping blistered siding.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolever

customer_reviews.title: It's a quality powerful machine.
customer_reviews.text: it does what it's suppose to do. powerful multi use, and it gets the job done. Satisfied client.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Amatuer DIYer Survives a Project
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I got this. It saved time and wear and tear on m body. Used to remove bath grout.
customer_reviews.author: D. Joshua

customer_reviews.title: on/off
customer_reviews.text: after two weeks of continuing use, the on off switch malfunctions. Other than that the product is an working asset
customer_reviews.author: Jasper jumbo

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law uses all the time to make repairs in their home. He loved his gift.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described. Make sure the nut is tight as I have had it come loose.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: It worked well once I added a star lock washer ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked well once I added a star lock washer and tightened the living bejeepers out of the tool attachment screw. I felt I was risking stripping out the threads. Without this modification the tool fell off multiple times in less than ten seconds of operation. I was forewarned about this characteristic so it was not a surprise. But I could not have done the job without this tool.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Non original replacements are a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Great equipment. Must have. Just get non original Dremel Bits or accessories replacements because the originals are way to expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: A must-have saw for those tight areas where no other tool will do the job. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Don Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a champ but expect no less from Dremel
customer_reviews.text: used it to cut baseboards and door trim for hardwood install. Worked like a champ but expect no less from Dremel.
customer_reviews.author: SStrout

customer_reviews.title: I've used this to cut the hardwood floors, crown ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to cut the hardwood floors, crown moulding, screws, and thin metal laminate; and so far after a month of constant use, it has done an incredible job. For all my DIY projects it is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for cutting under door jams and didn't have power issues like others I have tried
customer_reviews.author: jonathan l bentley

customer_reviews.title: Good price and performed completely as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good price and performed completely as expected. May not be the best choice for industrial or daily regular use but for a hobbyist it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for light use
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than a Dewault or Bosch. Perfect for light use.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wasted.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son and he loves it. Just what we wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice handy tool
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for DIY projects. Great price- I should have bought one years ago .
customer_reviews.author: Randall D McCauley

customer_reviews.title: The new wood floor at my front door looks terrific.
customer_reviews.text: The tool worked perfectly to cut the baseboard and aluminum threshold. The new wood floor at my front door looks terrific.
customer_reviews.author: jay cook

customer_reviews.title: I love my Dremels
customer_reviews.text: I love my Dremels. The MM20-07 was bought to replace the 6300 model I used faithfully but I found out they no longer make that one. I was totally devastated because I had it for so many years, it was my sidekick and I had extra attachments I bought for it which are fun and fantastic to use.. The MM20-07 is a little heavier and fatter but my attachments work with it and it seems to work great. So the MM20-07 is my new side kick and we have a lot of catching up to do. From the big jobs to the little jobs, I love my Dremels !!
customer_reviews.author: TEE

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Found a device better than this at a fraction of the cost at harbor freight. I have to start putting the cart behind the horse at least one time in my life. Does this tool deliver? Yes it does. Looks like I am a slave to the net for the attachment though. Support for Dremel at all hardware stores in my area could be improved if Dremel put in some noticeable effort.
customer_reviews.author: SoundSpongeTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for five repairs and it has worked perfectly. One of the repairs was for a kitchen cabinet door in a rent house that could not be shut. I used the Multi-Max to remove a thin sliver of wood from the top of the door opening so that the door closes without binding. I never realized how useful this was until I got one.
customer_reviews.author: CPP5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for trimming door moldings for vinyl plank installation.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Mezera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this tool for a massive trim-job throughout my house. It was the perfect tool for the job. High quality...easy to use...tons of power. Once I'm done with the trim project, I'll need to purchase the grout-remover bit to tackle the next job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dremel Multi-Max and accessoeies
customer_reviews.text: good service, good product, just what i've experienced and have come to expect from Dremel
customer_reviews.author: Wilford H. Luethje

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Tool works like a dream and everything came nicely packaged and very quickly!!! Definitely recommend this item for any DIY'er
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished versions of these are worth every penny if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished versions of these are worth every penny if you don't use them daily. I've bought two (one to replace the one I borrowed from someone and broke, the other for myself) and I've never had an issue with them. They're very handy and very inexpensive refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: chewing sounds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's very practical and useful. The price is better and lower that others stores and online aswell. I am happy with my dremel.
customer_reviews.author: javier

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and easy to use. For home use you could'nt ask for more. I don't think you can find a better multi tool for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great tool easy to use and the price was
customer_reviews.text: Great tool easy to use and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: K lover

customer_reviews.title: powerfull and very usefull
customer_reviews.text: Used this tool on several projects the multi man is very powerfull and does an outstanding job. FYI at higher speeds the Multi max can get away from you if you dot have a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: michael brooks

customer_reviews.title: Oscillating goodness
customer_reviews.text: Took up 4 layers of old kitchen floor, the mastic is a bear! This little tool with its scrapper or the metal cutter for cutting cabinet bolts that will never unscrew is the best thing since electricity. Well worth the money and I'd purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Discerns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and excellent tool!
customer_reviews.text: I puchased a few weeks ago. I have only used the scraper and sander attachments. Easy to use, comforatble grip, adjustable speed is a plus, makes scraping and sanding preparations for painting go so much faster than by hand. Delivered on time and packaged well. I love this and wish I had gotten one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this tool to do some work around the house and he loves it. It came in handy and he has several other tools by Dremel that he likes also. Good Product.
customer_reviews.author: J Todd

customer_reviews.title: Dremel MM20-03 120-Volt Multi-Max Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: It's a Dremel. What more can be said for these great tools? Their usefulness is only limited by your imagination.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hix

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't good for what I used it for.
customer_reviews.text: I need to remove parkay flooring from little tiny corners under cabinets. I thought this would work geat but it simply wasn't powerful enough. For really light weight work, I'm sure it would be good.
customer_reviews.author: LauraM

customer_reviews.title: Happy with
customer_reviews.text: This guy replaced on that burned up; Has more power and quieter than last one. Happy with product
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to remodel my bathroom. It was awesome for cutting drywall, trimming door casing, and countless other things. I can't wait to use it when I remodel the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: MattyD85

customer_reviews.title: Dremel Max
customer_reviews.text: I purchsed this item aas a gift for my husband. He had used my our son's and kept asking for his own. He is quite the handyman and this tool will aid him in many of the jobs he does. I also have a regulear dremel that I used in my crafts so we are very pleased with the quality of the Dremel tools.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Golding

customer_reviews.title: My Dremel MM20-01 Multi-Max Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this item. Completed some projects with it. Very good to have. i would recommend to friends. thats the first tool my husband uses.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Dremel Multi-Max has worked great. I've already used it on two projects at home. The first was cutting drywall for a new dog door. Cut through with ease. I like the ease of use and multiple attachments.
customer_reviews.author: dnel92881

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it refurbish!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Multi-max refurbish and did not come with the original case (just a card board box). The tool stop working constantly, seams like there is a false contact inside. I need to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Amezcua

customer_reviews.title: but pretty good. I think that may be made of ...
customer_reviews.text: Multi-tool for the first time use, but pretty good. I think that may be made of the quality and detail.
customer_reviews.author: kenichi ueda

customer_reviews.title: He's excited!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and even though my husband hasn't used it yet, he's really excited about all the things he can do with this Dremel.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Langknecht

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: used to remove tile, drywall, cut wood, cut nails. trim moulding....it is now my go to tool for many projects. My kitchen remodel general contractor has one and after the first day of him being here I ordered one.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool did an outstanding job (with the add-on grout blades) for removing all the old grout in my shower. Worked very fast and made an impossible job go much quicker. Also found the tool very useful for some projects that required quick flush-cot of wooden dowels. Plan to use the tool for some light sanding around window frames and expect a similar great result.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: ... used it in a very demanding way cutting off bad deck boards
customer_reviews.text: I have used it in a very demanding way cutting off bad deck boards. Seems very strong. I made a good purchase. Ron
customer_reviews.author: Ron W.

customer_reviews.title: Better price than in stores
customer_reviews.text: My husband asked for one of these for Christmas and this was a better price than I could get in a store and saved me from going out in the cold to get it. He has used it and liked it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Anne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too large a circumference to fit my hand. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: maureen polich

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it yet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a planned project and have not used it yet. However, Dremel always works so I look forward to it easing some of the work I will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hamilton

product_meta.title: Dremel MM20-07 2.3-Amp Multi-Max Oscillating Tool Kit with 6 Universal Quickfit Accessories
product_meta.description: Style:Ultimate Tool Kit with 6 AccessoriesBrought to you by Dremel, the Multi-Max oscillating tool kit is a great addition to any jobsite or toolbox! Extremely handy, It comes with six Universal Quickfit accessories, which include a flush cutting blade, wood/drywall blade, hook-and-loop pad, and 3 sandpaper sheets for wood. The powerful tool is equipped with a 2.3-Amp motor and features variable speed operation (10, 000 – 21, 000 OPM). manufactured with durability in mind, the tool is backed by a limited 2-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Equipped with 2.3-amp motor- as powerful as many professional oscillating tools
Capable of variable speed operation (10,000-21,000 OPM)
New black color design helps user differentiate between Dremel's MM30 and MM40 oscillating tools
Kit includes 6 Universal Quickfit Accessories, including sanding sheets and cutting blades
Backed by a limited two-year warranty

specifications.Included Components: Wood/Drywall Blade, Oscillating Tool, Flush Cutting Blade, Sandpaper Sheets
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars216 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
